name: Agent Deep Research
description: Autonomous research agent powered by Gemini. Searches the web, analyzes sources, supports RAG with local files, and generates comprehensive research reports.
description_zh: 基于 Gemini 的自主深度研究 Agent。自动搜索网络、分析来源、支持本地文件 RAG，生成全面的研究报告。
author: openclaw-community

name: SEO Audit & Optimizer
description: Complete SEO toolkit: site audit, content optimization, keyword research, technical fixes, and Schema markup generation. Includes on-page, technical, content, schema, links, and keywords modules.
description_zh: 完整 SEO 工具包：站点审计、内容优化、关键词研究、技术修复、Schema 标记生成。包含页面、技术、内容、结构化数据、外链、关键词六大模块。
author: openclaw-community

name: Douyin Hot Trend
description: Real-time Douyin (TikTok China) trending topics scraper. Get top trending hashtags, videos, and content ideas. Pure Node.js script, no API key needed.
description_zh: 实时抖音热榜抓取工具，获取热门话题、视频和内容灵感。纯 Node.js 脚本，无需 API Key。
author: openclaw-community

name: Trend Watcher
description: Multi-platform trend monitoring across GitHub Trending, Google Trends, Twitter/X, Reddit, and Hacker News. Discover new tools and emerging topics.
description_zh: 多平台趋势监控，覆盖 GitHub Trending、Google Trends、Twitter/X、Reddit 和 Hacker News。发现新工具和新兴话题。
author: openclaw-community

name: Keywords Everywhere
description: Keyword research and analysis tool. Provides search volume, CPC, competition data, PASF analysis, domain ranking, and backlink data for SEO planning.
description_zh: 关键词研究和分析工具。提供搜索量、CPC、竞争度、PASF 分析、域名排名和外链数据，用于 SEO 规划。
author: openclaw-community

name: Affiliate Master
description: Strategic affiliate marketing advisor. Manages affiliate links, ensures FTC compliance, supports multiple networks (Amazon Associates, ShareASale, etc.).
description_zh: Affiliate 营销策略顾问。管理联盟链接、确保 FTC 合规、支持多个联盟网络（Amazon Associates、ShareASale 等）。
author: openclaw-community

name: Mia Content Creator
description: AI-powered content generation pipeline. Creates blog posts, social media content, newsletters, and marketing copy at scale with brand voice consistency.
description_zh: AI 内容生成流水线，批量创建博客文章、社媒内容、Newsletter 和营销文案，保持品牌调性一致。
author: openclaw-community

name: AI Video Generator
description: Generate short-form videos from text prompts. Supports multiple styles, aspect ratios, and automatic subtitle generation for TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Reels.
description_zh: AI 短视频生成工具，支持多种风格、画面比例和自动字幕，适用于抖音、YouTube Shorts 和 Reels。
author: openclaw-community

name: Autonomous Brain
description: Self-directed task planning and execution engine. Breaks down complex goals into actionable steps, prioritizes tasks, and executes them autonomously.
description_zh: 自主任务规划与执行引擎，将复杂目标拆解为可执行步骤、排列优先级并自主完成。
author: openclaw-community

name: Twitter Search
description: Advanced Twitter/X search and analytics. Search up to 1000 tweets with filters, analyze engagement patterns, and monitor competitor activity.
description_zh: Twitter/X 高级搜索和数据分析。支持搜索最多 1000 条推文、分析互动模式、监控竞品动态。
author: openclaw-community

name: Google News API
description: Google News structured data scraper. Fetches latest news by topic, region, or keyword with categorization and sentiment analysis.
description_zh: Google 新闻结构化数据抓取。按主题、地区或关键词获取最新新闻，支持分类和情感分析。
author: openclaw-community

name: YouTube API
description: YouTube Data API integration. Search videos, get channel stats, analyze trending content, and extract video metadata for content research.
description_zh: YouTube 数据 API 集成。搜索视频、获取频道数据、分析热门内容、提取视频元数据用于内容研究。
author: openclaw-community

name: Tube Summary
description: YouTube video summarizer. Extracts transcripts, generates concise summaries, key takeaways, and timestamps for any YouTube video.
description_zh: YouTube 视频摘要工具。提取字幕、生成简洁摘要、关键要点和时间戳。
author: openclaw-community

name: ClawShot
description: Screenshot and visual content capture tool for AI agents. Capture web pages, UI elements, and generate visual reports automatically.
description_zh: AI Agent 截图和视觉内容捕获工具。自动截取网页、UI 元素，生成可视化报告。
author: openclaw-community

name: Captions
description: Auto-generate captions and subtitles for video content. Supports multiple languages and export formats (SRT, VTT, TXT).
description_zh: 自动为视频内容生成字幕。支持多语言和多种导出格式（SRT、VTT、TXT）。
author: openclaw-community

name: Dashboard
description: Real-time agent monitoring dashboard. Tracks task completion, resource usage, costs, and performance metrics across all your AI agents.
description_zh: 实时 Agent 监控仪表盘。追踪任务完成率、资源使用、成本和所有 Agent 的性能指标。
author: openclaw-community

name: Startups
description: Startup analysis and market research framework. Evaluate business models, analyze TAM/SAM/SOM, and generate competitive landscape reports.
description_zh: 创业分析和市场研究框架。评估商业模式、分析 TAM/SAM/SOM、生成竞争格局报告。
author: openclaw-community

name: Business Development
description: Business development and partnership strategy toolkit. Identify opportunities, craft outreach templates, and manage deal pipelines.
description_zh: 商务拓展和合作策略工具包。发现机会、制作外联模板、管理交易管线。
author: openclaw-community

name: Growth Marketer
description: Growth marketing automation toolkit. A/B testing strategies, funnel optimization, user acquisition playbooks, and conversion rate optimization.
description_zh: 增长营销自动化工具包。A/B 测试策略、漏斗优化、用户获取方案和转化率优化。
author: openclaw-community

name: Feishu Doc
description: Feishu/Lark document automation. Create, read, and manage Feishu cloud documents programmatically for team collaboration.
description_zh: 飞书文档自动化。程序化创建、读取和管理飞书云文档，用于团队协作。
author: openclaw-community

name: Feishu Interactive Cards
description: Build and send interactive card messages in Feishu/Lark. Support buttons, forms, and dynamic content for bot interactions.
description_zh: 在飞书中构建和发送交互式卡片消息。支持按钮、表单和动态内容，用于机器人交互。
author: openclaw-community
